column2: ENGLISH
You've entered a region choked in black fog and it has begun to affect you.
My eyes are burning!
The Black Fog Sickness is getting worse.
The Black Fog Sickness is getting better.
It burns!
You've found out you have Malaise.
You've found out you have Red Fever.
You've found out you have Red Plague.
You've found out you have Shigella.
You've found out you have Hansen.
You've found out you have Delusia.
You've found out you have The Sickness.
You've found out you have Plaga.
I see, well atleast I know.
Your Medicus informs you that [From.GetFirstName] has Malaise.
Your Medicus informs you that [From.GetFirstName] has Red Fever.
Your Medicus informs you that [From.GetFirstName] has Red Plague.
Your Medicus informs you that [From.GetFirstName] has Shigella.
Your Medicus informs you that [From.GetFirstName] has Hansen.
Your Medicus informs you that [From.GetFirstName] has Delusia.
Your Medicus informs you that [From.GetFirstName] has The Sickness.
Your Medicus informs you that [From.GetFirstName] has Plaga.
I see, well atleast I know.
You have a scratchy throat, runny nose, and nagging cough, it seems you are sick
You have nearly unending disruptive coughing fits, nightsweats, and burn with fever it seems you are very sick
Your wound has festered, oozing pus and the skin around it has darkened in color. now you suffer from nightsweats, and a burning fever it seems you are very sick.
Damn.
[From.GetFirstName] has taken ill.
Send for the Medicus!
I'm sure it's nothing...
Your coughing hasn't abated, you suffer terrible fevers, and your sheets are soaked with sweat everynight. Your illness has progressed.
I'm dying!
Your coughing hasn't abated, but you don't seem any worse than usual.
I'm dying I tell you!!
Your coughing fits have lessened of late and you are not as feverish as you used to be. You seem to be getting better.
Thank [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!
You have a nagging pain when you try and walk or work, it seems you are hurt.
You have nearly unending disruptive pain that makes it very difficult, it seems you are very hurt.
You have a festering open wound, pain shooting through your body, and dizzy spells, you are in trouble.
Damn.
[From.GetFirstName] has been injured.
Send for the Medicus!
I'm sure it's nothing...
Your pain has noticably increased and the wound is festering, your injury has grown worse.
I'm dying!
Your pain is more or less the same so you don't seem any worse than usual.
I'm dying I tell you!!
Your pain has lessed lessened of late and the sores are less oozy. You seem to be getting better.
Thank [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!
[From.GetFirstName] has passed on, Joining Inn-z in the Underverse.
May Maku remove [From.GetHerHis] worldly burdens.
You are out in the court playing when a stranger approaches you, "Child, take me to court, I've important business."
Alright!
Who are you?
No, go away!
[From.GetFirstName] has reached schooling age and can receive a special education.
[From.GetSheHe] would do well as a commmander.
I see a spark of politics in [From.GetHerHim].
[From.GetFirstName] loves finance.
What do I care?
Congratulations, you have completed your education.
I wonder what kind of Marshal I'll make.
I'll rise in court quickly, I'm sure of it.
Penes, Lii, Harks, and Hazah, money makes the world go round.
What mark shall I make on the world?
Another child comes up to you at court, "Want to skip lessons and go with us?"
No, we have to study.
can it wait until after studies?
Absolutely, let's go!
While you are playing at court, a couple of the other children start fighting over a game.
Stop fighting.
You and the other children of the court start up a game of Turboll, now you just need to pick teams.
I call captain.
You and another child find a purse filled with Lii and talk about what you should do with it.
I know.
You are out late at night, and walk into court. As you flitter, two figures enter and start speaking in hushed tones.
Listen in.
You are on your way to court when come accross a book in the hall and stop to pick it up.
Sounds interesting.
As you sit reading Winnen of Sterven, you hear other children playing outside and having fun.
Not without me!
I can at least watch for awhile.
Good for them *Continue reading*
Players shouldn't ever see me, Random AI stat Gain.
Gain Stat
Tutor Player - Employer
Tutor Player - Liege
[From.GetFirstName] appears one day after you have dismissed your court, '[Root.GetFirstName], I noticed you struggled with some ideas in court, I could explain them to you, if you wish.'
Really? That would be great!
No thanks, I don't need your help.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] appears one day after you have dismissed your court, '[Root.GetFirstName] finishes [FromFrom.GetHerHis] lesson, 'Excellent, it seems like you understand it'

[FromFrom.GetFirstName] appears one day after you have dismissed your court, '[Root.GetFirstName] finishes [FromFrom.GetHerHis] lesson and looks at you in astonishment, 'Incredible, I never thought of it that way!'
Thank you so much, [FromFrom.GetFirstName]
You are out in the court playing when another child approaches you, "You want see something?"
Do I?!
What is it?
No, now leave me alone!
While you are in court, you see one of the courtiers grab [Root.GetHerHis] chest and fall over, the others start shouting "[Root.GetSheHe]'s dead!" and running about.
C'est la vie.
Sad to see [Root.GetHerHim] go.
That will be one day!
[From.GetFirstName] presents to you a sword, it is of fine quality, but nothing special.
[From.GetFirstName] presents to you a sword, it is of fine quality, embellished with gold.
[From.GetFirstName] presents to you a sword, it is of fine quality, masterfully smithed and embellished.
[From.GetFirstName] presents to you a sword, it is of master quality and smithed of bonemetal, hilted with a blood red wrap.
[From.GetFirstName] presents to you a sword, it is of master quality and smithed of bonemetal, with a blade that seems to absorb light.
[From.GetFirstName] presents to you a sword, it is of master quality and smithed of bonemetal, with a blade that seems to shimmer with the light of Eker.
[From.GetFirstName] presents to you a sword, it is of master quality and smithed of bonemetal, so sharp it cuts flesh as easily as air.
[From.GetFirstName] presents to you a sword, it is of master quality and smithed of bonemetal, seems to glow with the light of dusk.
[From.GetFirstName] presents to you a sword, it is of master quality and smithed of bonemetal, strong enough to cleave stone.
[From.GetFirstName] presents to you a sword, it is of master quality and smithed of bonemetal, with a thrust that can pierce armor with ease.
[From.GetFirstName] presents to you a sword, it is of master quality and smithed of bonemetal, it strikes with a silver flash.
[From.GetFirstName] presents to you a sword, it is of master quality and smithed of bonemetal, of such great heft that it can crush armor with a swing.
It's great work, [From.GetFirstName].
[From.GetFirstName] presents to you a set of armor, A finely worked piece of leather armor.
[From.GetFirstName] presents to you a set of armor, An expertly crafted piece of leather armor dyed black.
[From.GetFirstName] presents to you a set of armor, A masterfully crafted piece of chainmail..
[From.GetFirstName] presents to you a set of armor, it is of master quality and smithed of bonemetal, it's deep black barely shimmers in the light.
[From.GetFirstName] presents to you a set of armor, it is of master quality and smithed of bonemetal, with a deep bronze shimmer.
[From.GetFirstName] presents to you a set of armor, it is of master quality and smithed of bonemetal, that shines with a bright gold.
[From.GetFirstName] presents to you a set of armor, it is of master quality and smithed of bonemetal, the sheen has been dulled.
[From.GetFirstName] presents to you a set of armor, it is of master quality and smithed of bonemetal, reinforced to absorb the blows during a charge.
[From.GetFirstName] presents to you a set of armor, it is of master quality and smithed of bonemetal, a full set of knightplate that shimmers of silver in the light.
[From.GetFirstName] presents to you a set of armor, it is of master quality and smithed of bonemetal, shines with a bright grey sheen.
It's great work, [From.GetFirstName].
You're pet has outgrown its baby stage and matured into a fine animal.
Who's a good dear?
You call for your pet but no response. As you look for it, you find its limp body.
What?? No!
You call for your pet but no response. As you look for it, you find it near a tree with a new litter curled up beside it.
Look at all the cute babies!!
But we can't keep them.
You are out on a hunt when you hear a call in the distance. You track down the source of the sound and find an injured animal.
Oh you poor Beon, [Root.GetFirstName]'s gonna take care of you.
Oh you poor Kunun, [Root.GetFirstName]'s gonna take care of you.
Oh you poor Pleen, [Root.GetFirstName]'s gonna take care of you.
Oh you poor Tochon, [Root.GetFirstName]'s gonna take care of you.
Oh you poor Tusken, [Root.GetFirstName]'s gonna take care of you.
You poor beast, you are hurt, best to end it quickly.
All your martial practice as improved your skill.
Great!
In the midst of battle, you caught the wrong end of a random blade or projectile and fell to the ground, before like you could no longer move or speak. And finally the world was veiled by darkness.
I die!
In the midst of battle, you see that one of the enemy commanders is open to attack, you could charge in and strike.
Have at them!
My guard can handle this.
No need for personal glory, we will win the day regardless.
In the midst of battle, you see that the enemy is pushing hard on the center, if you give ground you could envelop them.
In the midst of battle, you see that the enemy flank is weak, could pull troops from you line and smash into it.
In the midst of battle, you see that the enemy is pushing forward with everything, if you fall back they may give chase.
In the midst of battle, your reserves have gone unnoticed, they could be withdrawn to setup an ambush.
This will work.
I'll tell my liege.
This is too crazy.
You notice the enemy is manuvering [STPlanner.GetHerHis] troops in effort to pull off a tactic.
It's an Envelopment!
[STPlanner.GetSheHe]'s going to Flank!
[STPlanner.GetFirstName]'s planning a Feint!
I won't fall for [STPlanner.GetHerHis] Ambush!
[STPlanner.GetFirstName] comes to you and lays out a plan for attacking the enemy.
This will work.
This is too crazy.
Your center slowly gives, drawing the enemy in, before long [STVictim.GetHerHis] flanks buckle and your troops surround the enemy.
You pull troops from your center then the call rings out for a charge, before long [STVictim.GetFirstName]'s flank collapses and you smash into [STVictim.GetHerHis] rear.
You call for a retreat and your troops start falling back, [STVictim.GetFirstName] reacts and charges after you, soon [STVictim.GetHerHis] troops are tired and you attack.
You send your forces to hide and slowly give ground to the enemy, you finally reach the area and signal, the ambush is sprung and crashes into the [STVictim.GetFirstName]'s flank.
You slowly pull your center back but [STVictim.GetFirstName] doesn't push, instead [STVictim.GetSheHe] strengthens [STVictim.GetHerHis] flanks and pushes you back.
You pull troops from the center and try to flank [STVictim.GetFirstName], but [STVictim.GetSheHe] sees the flank and charges into your weakened center.
You call for a retreat and your troops start falling back, but [STVictim.GetFirstName] doesn't follow and instead strengthens [STVictim.GetHerHis] defenses and harasses your retreat.
You send your reserves to hide in ambush and slowly fall back, but when you reach the ambush site, [STVictim.GetFirstName] sends [STVictim.GetHerHis] reserves against your hidden troops.
Excellent!
No, damn it!
Determine a winner of the duel round.
[dueler1.GetFirstName]
[dueler2.GetFirstName]
[dueler1.GetFirstName] strikes away your weapon, forcing you to your knee. [dueler1.GetSheHe] lifts the blade for a killing stroke.
Roll
I surrender!
[From.GetFirstName] drops [From.GetHerHis] weapon and throws up [From.GetHerHis] hands in surrender.
Guards!
So sorry.

You watch on as [dueler2.GetFirstName] twists [dueler2.GetHerHis] weapon and disarms [dueler1.GetFirstName]. As [dueler2.GetFirstName] readies a killing strike, [dueler1.GetFirstName] declares surrender

You watch on as [dueler2.GetFirstName] twists [dueler2.GetHerHis] weapon and disarms [dueler1.GetFirstName]. You can only watch as [dueler2.GetFirstName]'s weapon tears into [dueler1.GetFirstName], leaving [dueler1.GetHerHim] in a pool of blood.
Damn!
Farewell, [dueler1.GetFirstName].
You close the gap with [dueler2.GetFirstName], who takes up a guard position. So you decide to attack with...
A Thrust.
A Swing.
A Chop.
[dueler1.GetFirstName] closed with you, putting you on the defensive and readies an attack. So you decide to defend with...
A Parry.
A Retreat.
A Block.
Called for a Hunt
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has called a great hunt and almost certainly expects you to join [From.GetHerHim] in the venture.
Ofcourse I'll join
Find an excuse not to.
Hunt Begins
Your commanders have responded and all seem eager to join the hunt alongside you. Your supplies are ready and all await your command
Your commanders have responded, though not all seem eager to join the hunt alongside you. Either way, your supplies are ready and all await your command
Very well, let's be on our way.
Creature Encounter
While on your hunt, you encounter a strange beast. The rest of your party stand in awe of the mighty beast.
I must have it!
I must have its Fur!
The Hunt has Ended
The hunt draws to a close, as you and your commanders have bagged a great number of trophy creatures, not to mention you numerous displays of ability.
The memory will surely last for some time.
As you are attending to the matters of court, adjudicating squabbles between the lords of your realm, mostly complaints over cattle and boundaries, you overhear talks extolling your liege.

As you are attending to the matters of court, adjudicating squabbles between the realm lords, when [From.GetFirstName] bursts in, "My Lord, I must tell you about the greatness of [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]".
You know, [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] has treated me well.
Damn it, [From.GetFirstName] [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] sent you,didn't [From.Liege.GetSheHe]?!
As you are attending to the matters of court, you overhear one of the courtiers talking about a vicious slander about you.
As you are attending to the matters of court, [From.GetFirstName] starts talking loudly, "Can you believe what [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] said about [Root.GetFirstName]?"
[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] said what??
Damn it, [From.GetFirstName] [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] sent you, didn't [From.Liege.GetSheHe]?!
As you are attending to the matters of court, you overhear one of the courtiers talking about a vicious slander about you.
As you are attending to the matters of court, [From.GetFirstName] starts talking loudly, "Can you believe what [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] said about [Root.GetFirstName]?"
[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] said what??
Damn it, [From.GetFirstName] [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] sent you, didn't [From.Liege.GetSheHe]?!
Welcome to Goshen

The Gawei are fervant supporters of the Supreme Elder, what is commanded, the Gawei obey. This unquestioning obedience has seen great stability in the Realm and, through the elite Gawei commanders, the Will of the Supreme Elder, caused the Gawei grow from one of many tribes to Rulers of the whole Island and beyond. A solid next step to take would be finishing off the Ran-nu.

For much of their history, the Ran-nu were a collection of mostly cooperative but independent tribes. This changed when the Gawei landed, the Tribes came together to oust the invaders, but failed against the discplined force. Afterwards the Gawei flooded in and forced the Ran-nu into the East Daly Mountains. But now, the Ran-nu are firmly united, it is time to raise the Ran-nu army, the Bule, and return home.

Levyt is the largest realm of Goshen to date, it wasn't always so. Prior to the Gawei Invasion it was a single City-state at the mouth of the river, but soon diplomacy and trade saw their influence spread and member states join the council. Now the Levytans watch carefully as the Abimelech to the west and the Gawei begin the Days of Strife. For, perhaps, some gains could be made. Mayhaps even the return of Kzi.

The Abimelech are a people made strong by the harsh mountains the inhabit. As such they follow The Way, the Strong protect and rule the Weak and the Weak serve the Strong. Because of this belief, battle and war are integral to their society, if they can take it, it belongs to them. A fact their immediate neighbors know very well, from the yearly raids they suffer. A wily Chief might fully conquer the Kalani as a first step.

The Silent One leads the Hesen through the Asante. For a time, the Silent One demanded the Hesen ignore the world outside their island but. Learning of unbelievers in Goshen, the Silent One commands the Hesen to seek them out and see to their conversion, or destruction. And the first Conversions shall be on the nearest island, Khes.

Hello and welcome to the World of Goshen, created by Dillon B. Sapp and Cody Lee Collins. It is a broken world full of people, Goshenites, struggling to survive in these Days of Strife. With the Gawei and Ran-nu trading blows over a peninsula and the Abimelech settling who sits on the Skull Throne, as the Levyt watch on intently. The West of Pan is never stable, for the Anin ever seek to unit the Blavs while passing through the Gap to harass the Ades.
For the Supreme!
Call up the Bule, we march!
Watch and wait, strike when it's time.
The Axe and the Mountain!
Purge the disbelievers!
Oh, interesting!
Ok
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has seen fit to strike into your Realm, intent on forcing your people from their homes.
Raise the Levies!
[recruit.GetFullName] entered your court, offering [recruit.GetHerHis] services.
Welcome, [recruit.GetFirstName]
